shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes receiving the video stream of a specified user.

p.codeblock: public abstract int muteRemoteVideoStreamEx(int uid, boolean muted, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int muteRemoteVideoStreamEx(uid_t uid, bool mute, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int MuteRemoteVideoStreamEx(int64 uid, bool mute, const FRtcConnection& connection);
public abstract int MuteRemoteVideoStreamEx(uint uid, bool mute, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> muteRemoteVideoStreamEx( {required int uid, required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});

section.title: Details
section.p: This method is used to stop or resume receiving the video stream of a specified user. You can call this method before or after joining a channel. If a user leaves a channel, the settings in this method become invalid.

pd.p: The user ID of the remote user.

pt.props: ios mac cpp unreal bp rn unity electron flutter cs

pd.p:
Whether to stop receiving the video stream of the specified user:
: Stop receiving the video stream of the specified user.
: (Default) Resume receiving the video stream of the specified user.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

li.props: native unreal bp unity rn electron cs

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
